content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nI successfully wrote a martial arts poem to the file "martial_arts_poem.txt". I received confirmation that the file was written to successfully. I then executed the command "read_file" to access the "martial_arts_poem.txt" file. Command read_file returned: Martial arts, the way of the warrior. I also used the command "browse_website" to visit blackbeltmag.com and asked "What is the history of karate?".'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text does not provide any information about the history of karate. It only lists various companies and their cookie and privacy policies. \n \n Links: ['News (https://blackbeltmag.com/news/)', 'Mixed Martial Arts (https://blackbeltmag.com/mixed-martial-arts/)', 'UFC (https://blackbeltmag.com/mixed-martial-arts/ufc/)', 'Bellator (https://blackbeltmag.com/mixed-martial-arts/bellator/)', 'ONE Championship (https://blackbeltmag.com/mixed-martial-arts/one-championship/)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "."}}}'}]
"""
